name: Ray Cathode
description:
Ray Cathode was made in the GMTK Game Jam 2020 - Out of Control.

Ray Cathode is a challenging action platformer game in which you attempt to escape a facility built for dismantling old electronics. Our protagonist, Ray Cathode is nimble but lacks in terms of usable memory. This causes Ray to short circuit if he attempts to issue too many control commands in a short span of time.

Ray Cathode was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 in which the theme was "Out of Control". In the game you adventure through numerous stages trying not to run Out of Controls to use.


The game was created by:

Matias Huhta,

Antti Pakkanen

Juha Nikkanen
